data.name: Szrot
data.detailed_description:
The streetracing underworld stretches deep throughout post-soviet Eastern Europe.
There's a new challenger around every corner, and as a newcomer, you have nowhere to go but up!

Szrot

You play as a newcomer in the already an sprawling streetracing scene. Equipped with nothing but your uncle's old Szrot, you may have to play dirty to win.
But watch out! You're not the only one willing to bend the rules.

If your car breaks, steers wrong or is simply too slow, you can get it fixed in the repair shop. With the right connections, you might even be able to tune it a bit.

And if you need a little extra cash, there's plenty of people, who need favors. Legal or not...

During your ascent to the top, you'll go through many diverse locations. From the mean streets of Beograd to the luscious forests of the Finland-Russia border.

Gameplay Features

  • Racing
  • Semi-open worlds
  • Destruction
  • Customize your Szrot
  • Help babcia with her groceries
  • Drive home your drunk friend before he pukes
  • Flee from the police
  • Annoy commuters

data.short_description: Szrot is a driving game about the underappreciated cars and cultures of Eastern Europe!
data.supported_languages: English, Danish, Czech, Finnish, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 570
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
